name: Hello Kitty Online
summary: Hello Kitty Online (HKO) is a free-to-playmassively multiplayer online role playing game developed by Sanrio Digital and Typhoon Games. The game is tied to the SanrioTown website, where players are required to register a free account.
info:
• 中文名: 凯蒂猫在线
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: MMO
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2009-07-01
  • 官方网站: http://www.hellokittyonline.com/
